resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108032</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Character education: What would you do?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichenausbildung: Was würden Sie tun?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Éducation de caractère : Que feriez-vous ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instrução do caráter: Que você faria?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Formazione del carattere: Che cosa fareste?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκπαίδευση χαρακτήρα: Τι θα κάνατε;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Educación del carácter: ¿Qué usted 
haría?</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is designed to teach character development, problem solving, and teamwork. It can also be used with exceptional students in a high school setting.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist konzipiert, um Zeichenentwicklung, das 
Lösen von Problemen und Teamwork zu unterrichten. Sie kann mit 
aussergewöhnlichen Kursteilnehmern in einer High School Einstellung 
auch verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est conçue pour enseigner le développement 
de caractère, la résolution des problèmes, et le travail d'équipe.
Elle peut également être utilisée avec les étudiants 
exceptionnels dans une configuration de lycée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é projetada ensinar o desenvolvimento do 
caráter, resolver de problema, e o teamwork. Pode também ser 
usada com estudantes excepcionais em um ajuste da High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è destinata per insegnare lo sviluppo del 
carattere, la soluzione dei problemi ed il lavoro di squadra. 
Può anche essere usata con gli allievi eccezionali in una 
regolazione della High School.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα έχει ως σκοπό να διδάξει την ανάπτυξη
χαρακτήρα, την επίλυση προβλήματος, και την ομαδική εργασία. 
Μπορεί επίσης να χρησιμοποιηθεί με τους εξαιρετικούς 
σπουδαστές σε μια τιμή τών παραμέτρων γυμνασίου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se diseña para enseñar el desarrollo del 
carácter, solucionar de problema, y trabajo en equipo. Puede 
también ser utilizada con los estudiantes excepcionales en una 
configuración de la High School secundaria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:WILLIAM HOVIS
FN:WILLIAM HOVIS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204609</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108032</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/character-education-what-would-you-do</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
